Class ServerWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.BasicWindow
        • view.ServerWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, View

    public class ServerWindow
extends BasicWindow
implements View
    The Class ServerWindow. This class is an implemnetation of the view and an extension of the basic window,as part of the MVP structure
